decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to control the game through counterspells, bounce spells, and card draw while using small evasive creatures to chip away at the opponent's life total. Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel serves as the commander, providing additional card advantage and creating treasure tokens. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Counterspell, Force of Will, and Force Spike, while also utilizing bounce spells such as Boomerang and Brazen Borrower to deal with threats. The deck also includes card draw spells like Archmage's Charm, Gitaxian Probe, and Ponder to ensure a steady stream of answers and threats. Ultimately, the deck seeks to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent in a long game.

This deck revolves around utilizing the powerful abilities of The Gitrog Monster to create a combo engine that generates value and card advantage. The deck includes a wide array of lands and spells that allow for efficient mana generation, graveyard recursion, and card draw. By leveraging cards like Life from the Loam, Splendid Reclamation, and Ramunap Excavator, the deck can quickly fill the graveyard and take advantage of The Gitrog Monster's ability to draw cards when lands are put into the graveyard. Additionally, the deck includes various removal spells and protection cards to ensure that The Gitrog Monster can stay on the battlefield and continue to generate value throughout the game.
